Class RemoteDbSelectAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qore.jni.QoreObjectWrapper

  • public class RemoteDbSelectAction
extends AbstractRemoteDbSelectAction
    Selects data from a remote DB and compares to expected data

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteDbSelectAction

        public RemoteDbSelectAction​(java.lang.String remote,
                            java.lang.String dsname,
                            java.lang.String tableName,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> sh,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object>[] data,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> opts)
                     throws java.lang.Throwable
        Creates the object according to the arguments
        Parameters:
        remote - the name of the remoteconn "remote connection"
        dsname - the name of the remote datasource
        tableName - the primary table name for the select stream
        sh - the select hash for the select stream
        data - the expected row data in the remote database; must be a list of hashes
        opts - select stream options; see OMQ::DbRemoteReceive::constructor() for information; note that the "select" stream option is added automaticallty using the sh argument when opening the stream
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
        Note:
        data is always streamed in row format

      • RemoteDbSelectAction

                     throws java.lang.Throwable
        Creates the object according to the arguments
        Parameters:
        remote - the name of the remoteconn "remote connection"
        dsname - the name of the remote datasource
        tableName - the primary table name for the select stream
        sh - the select hash for the select stream
        data - the expected row data in the remote database; must be a list of hashes
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable
        Note:
        data is always streamed in row format
